name: CultureMattersPodcastonInternationalBusiness
0:
”Alexa, open Culture Matters”
”Alexa, start Culture Matters”
”Alexa, ask Culture Matters”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: culture matters
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Build your Cultural Competence, listen to interesting stories, learn about the Cultural Pitfalls and how to avoid them, get the Global Perspective here at the Culture Matters podcast on International Business & Marketing, Cultural Differences & Cultural Diversity.
We help you understand Cultural Differences & Diversity better by interviewing real people with real experiences.
Every episode there is an interview with a prominent guest, who will tell his or her story and share international experiences. Helping you develop your cultural competence.
Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands: **Next/Previous Episode** — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next” — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous” **Select Latest Episode** — “Alexa, ask Culture Matters to play latest episode” **Select First Episode** — “Alexa, ask Culture Matters to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
